## TranslationDetails.inProgressTranslationInfo property

A list of `TranslationJobInfo`<!-- -->s containing information about the translations currently in progress where this Item is the target Item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get inProgressTranslationInfo(): ReadonlyArray<TranslationJobInfo> | undefined;
```
